---
title: Cart
sidebar:
  order: 5
slug: shopify/forms/cart
---

Cart form is basically the main element of the Cart Page, and allows your user to get a recap about their items in cart and allows to proceed to checkout! There's no corresponding element inside Webflow, so the only way is making it with Custom attributes ðŸ˜Ÿ

> This form can be added only in this page! To declare a cart form, set as **Form Name** the value **Cart**. Inside the cart form there are many elements with attributes so just by copying the element below and customize it with your style!

<copy-element name="Cart Form" b64></copy-element>

If you still want to make it manually, you need to use Custom Attributes. Inside the Cart form you can add the following elements:


## Cart Notes

To add cart notes just add a textarea with name "note". 

<copy-element name="Cart Notes Textarea"></copy-element>

## Cart Attributes

Cart attributes are additional infos that you can ask from the Cart page. To create them just add the input fields you need, with the names you desire, they will be automatically converted as Cart attributes.


## Update Button

It's a **Submit Button** that allows your customer to update their cart. To create it just add the following attribute on a submit button:

<custom-attribute name="cart" value="update-button"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Cart Update Button"></copy-element>

## Cart Original Total Price

Returns the subtotal of the cart before any discounts have been applied. The amount is in the customer's local (presentment) currency.

To create this element just add a text element with the custom attribute:

<custom-attribute name="cart" value="original-total-price"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Cart Original Total Price"></copy-element>

## Cart Total Discount

Returns the total of all discounts (the amount saved) for the cart. The amount is in the customer's local (presentment) currency.

To create this element just add a text element with the custom attribute:

<custom-attribute name="cart" value="total-discount"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Cart Total Discount"></copy-element>

## Cart Total Price

Returns the total price of all of the items in the cart. 

To create this element just add a text element with the custom attribute:

<custom-attribute name="cart" value="total-price"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Cart Total Price"></copy-element>


## Cart Total Weight

Returns the total weight, in grams, of all of the items in the cart.

To create this element just add a text element with the custom attribute:

<custom-attribute name="cart" value="total-weight"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Cart Total Weight"></copy-element>


## Cart Items

The elements where you will add the following attribute will be repeated once for each item that your customer has inside the cart:

<custom-attribute name="cart" value="items"></custom-attribute>

<copy-element name="Cart Items" b64></copy-element>

Inside this element you can add one or all of the following elements:

### Title

This is the title of the product. Can be added on texts using the attribute:

<custom-attribute name="item" value="title"></custom-attribute>

### Featured Image

This is the featured image of the product, can be added on Images or Divs as Background using the attribute:

<custom-attribute name="item" value="featured-image"></custom-attribute>

### Link

This is the link to the product, can be added on any link element using the attribute:

<custom-attribute name="item" value="link"></custom-attribute>


### Remove

This is the link to remove the product, can be added on any link element using the attribute:

<custom-attribute name="item" value="remove"></custom-attribute>

### Vendor

This is the vendor of the product. Can be added on texts using the attribute:

<custom-attribute name="item" value="vendor"></custom-attribute>

### Price

This is the price of the product. Can be added on texts using the attribute:

<custom-attribute name="item" value="price"></custom-attribute>

### Properties

This are the properties of the product. Can be added on texts using the attribute:

<custom-attribute name="item" value="properties"></custom-attribute>

### Original Price

This is the original price of the product. It will be only showed if the product was on sale. Can be added on texts using the attribute:

<custom-attribute name="item" value="original-price"></custom-attribute>

### Total Price

This is the total price of the line (Product Price x Quantity). Can be added on texts using the attribute:

<custom-attribute name="item" value="total"></custom-attribute>

### Quantity

This is the quantity of the current product, it can be added to an input or a text with the attribute

<custom-attribute name="item" value="quantity"></custom-attribute>
